long_description: Where will the Columbia Global Adventure Dress take you? If it's Italy or Brazil in the sunny heat of summer, you'll love the special wicking and sun protection properties of the fabric. Polyester/elastane offers 2-way stretch for freedom of movement. Omni-Wick EVAP(TM) advanced wicking technology disperses sweat quickly across a broad surface for faster evaporation; thus, you stay drier and more comfortable. Omni-Shade(TM) technology gives you excellent UPF 40 sun protection. Columbia Global Adventure Dress hides a zippered security pocket in the right side seam.
short_description: Where will the Columbia Global Adventure Dress take you? If it's Italy or Brazil in the sunny heat of summer, you'll love the special wicking and sun protection properties of the fabric.
